summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Cai Cosmetics Gel Eyeliner & Brush 2-Piece Set Stay All Day Waterproof (Brown) Review Date: 2019/02/14 Store: Cai Cosmetics New York Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cai Cosmetics New York', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '844952182489'} Review Text: It stays put..except 4 it dries out 2 fast..other than that..I would of gave it 5 🌟 Review Title: Overallll greatttt product).. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 48 Pairs Eyebrow Stencils Templates Shaping Eyebrow Stencils and 3 Pieces Eyebrow Razors Eyebrow Shavers for Women Makeup Tools Review Date: 2019/10/17 Store: Blulu Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {} Review Text: Pretty neat & luv the ways 2 help U2 do ur brows these days👍 Review Title: It helps very much:) Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyeliner and Eyelash Kit Natural Look Waterproof and Smudge Resistant No Glue Easier To Use Than Traditional Magnetic Eyelashes Review Date: 2019/11/16 Store: ALICROWN HAIR Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 2.4 x 0.79 inches; 1.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '734830079171'} Review Text: The only reason 4 four stars, is the band on the lashes seem a lil 2 thick, the lashes themselves seem normal & nice👌 Review Title: Nice & ok😀 Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Handcrafted Angled, Winged Eye Brush. One Touch Cat Eye - UNDONE BEAUTY Eye Shadow + Liner Brush. For Precise Outer Eye & Lash Line Definition. Soft & Durable Bristles. Vegan & Cruelty Free. Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: UNDONE BEAUTY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'UNDONE BEAUTY', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow', 'Material': 'synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.13 x 0.38 x 0.31 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.13 x 0.38 x 0.31 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'Item model number': '93157', 'UPC': '087327004720'} Review Text: Soo LOVELY & PERFECT (especially 4 beginners✌) 2 do ur crease/it takes the guess work out of it:)👍
P.S Alot of reviews said it didn't have 2 like the picture shows..I could tell there would only b one..it's showing a close-up of the brush:) Also they sent me a lovely card with 20% off my nxt purchace..I'm going 2 use it 2 get me another one/just 2 have 4 different colors👆 Review Title: LOVELY & VERY USEFUL👍 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Makeup Base Primer for Face, GPGP GREENPEOPLE Face Primer for Oily Skin - Blur + Pore Minimizer, Shine Control Make Up Primer to Hide Wrinkles and Fine Lines - SPF 30 Sunscreen - Natural Finish Review Date: 2020/11/28 Store: GPGP GREENPEOPLE Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GPGP GREENPEOPLE', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.33 x 0.66 x 4.6 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '713803942865'} Review Text: These greenpeople r AMAZING!..I've got ONE of their other product & it's the BEST also👍 They only have the 2 tho😨but I bet if they made a line of makeup, they would b a BIG HIT😍 Review Title: BIG HIT👌 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: CASABLANCA BEAUTY®-Clear Eyelash Glue, False Eyelash Glue, Latex Free Eyelash Glue Clear Waterproof Suitable for Sensitive Eyes 0.16 US Fl oz Review Date: 2021/06/14 Store: Casablanca Beauty Product Description: ["The best-selling LUXE eyelash adhesive! Not messy, gunky or bad odors. Why You'll Love Our Glue: Casablanca Beauty is dedicated to making quality products available to our customers. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed How to Use: 1. Using the precision brush, add a fine layer of adhesive to the false eyelash strip. 2. Wait 30 seconds for the adhesive to become tacky before applying. (Don't skip this step!) 3. Apply false eyelash as close as possible to the natural lash, gently press onto lash line until the entire eyelash strip is secured into place and adhesive is dried. *For best results, use Casablanca Beauty Lashes and accessories. VOILÁ- GORGEOUS, FLUTTERY, 24-HR HOLD LASHES!"] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Casablanca Beauty', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 0.6 x 4.5 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Casablanca Beauty'} Review Text: The adhesion with tis was not even workable 4 me😵 Review Title: Didn't like it🥴 Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: IMSOHOT Matte Stiletto Press on Nails Long Almond White False Nails Snake Pattern Black Fake Nails Full Cover Acrylic Nails for Nail Art Salon DIY Decoration Review Date: 2021/12/15 Store: IMSOHOT Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Color': 'White', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'IMSOHOT', 'Style': 'Stiletto', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '5.16 x 2.64 x 0.51 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IMCRJ224', 'UPC': '768121891746'} Review Text: All was intact & exactly as described 👍 Review Title: NEAT❣️ Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rechargeable Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner with Built-In Battery - Deep Cleaning 3-Speed Makeup Brush Cleaner Machine Includes Universal Fitting Brush Collar - Fast Spinning Wash and Dry - White Review Date: 2022/02/16 Store: Femerchi Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.35 x 4.76 x 4.69 inches; 10.51 Ounces', 'UPC': '804589129714'} Review Text: Tis is the PERFECT makeup brush cleaner & they all should b made like tis/less hassle❣️ It spins good & cleans well👍
P.S The Company is greatttt ⭐ it had a card n my package 4a free one & u know U can't have 2 many makeup brush cleaners (I can't anyway, makeup brush everything junkie here👋) It got delivered 2 me within 2 days⭐ They really deserve a million n one of these⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐:) Review Title: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had numerous positive experiences with their beauty purchases. They expressed love for products that offered effectiveness and versatility, such as tools that facilitate brow shaping and precise eye makeup application. Many items received admiration for their quality and ease of use, especially for beginners. High ratings were given to products deemed "amazing" and "perfect," with mentions of excellent customer service and promotional offers enhancing their shopping experience. Fast delivery times added to the overall satisfaction, reinforcing a strong affinity for the brands that provided them with pleasant shopping moments.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite generally positive experiences, the user faced several disappointments. Issues included products that dried out quickly and others that didn't adhere well, leading to frustrations with their application. Tools that did not meet expectations or required excessive effort to achieve desired results were noted. Some products received lower ratings due to thickness or discomfort, impacting the overall enjoyment and effectiveness. The user also encountered items that did not match their needs, impacting their overall satisfaction.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user's shopping experience reveals a mix of satisfaction and frustration. Positive encounters highlighted effective products, excellent customer service, and a love for versatile beauty tools, particularly suited for beginners. However, there were notable complaints regarding product performance, such as adhesion issues and applicability concerns. While the user clearly values quality and effective products, challenges with certain items tempered their overall experience, suggesting room for improvement within specific product lines.

target_interaction.title: A+❣️
target_interaction.text:
These r very nice & with a very nice complimentary instruction card🌹 U pay 4 one card n a dollar store just for 1 & with these U get 36 of them & These r just as nice❣️
NOTE: I hope tis helps & I'm trying 2 make it n person as possible:)..there r 36 of like the same size cards (a 3x4/2x4) instead of several long sheets/U look at 1 whole page of them & that's 36 of them & still just as nice & durable👌 reviews helps each other & good 2 know.. especially n 2022✅
target_interaction.title_meta: 36 Sheets French Stripes Nail Art Stickers Geometric Nail Decals Abstract Colorful Wave Line Irregular Curves Water Transfer Nail Art Supplies DIY for Women Girls (Stripes)
features: MORE CHOICES -- You will get 36 different designs of abstract nail art decals.
FASHION DESIGN -- The nail stickers are designed with popular elements such as colorful stripes, geometric, wave line, irregular curves , etc. Various styles adapt to the trend of each season.
SAFE MATERIAL -- This nail art supplies is made of safe and environmentally friendly materials, skin-friendly, you can use it with confidence.

EASY TO USE -- The water transfer design is very easy to use. You just need to cut out your favorite design, put it into water 10-20 seconds, then take it out with tweezers and stick to your nails, finally fix it with a top coat or nail polish.
DIY NAIL ART -- You can do all kinds of bold and stylish nail designs, so that you can easily get the attention and envy of the people around you.
